name: linted-paths
description: Type-safe file system operations with compile-time path validation

scripts.pre-publish: pnpm run test:run && pnpm run lint && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run build && pnpm run verify-package
scripts.post-publish: pnpm run create-git-tag && pnpm run create-github-release
scripts.create-git-tag: git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") 2>/dev/null || echo 'Tag already exists' && git push origin v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") 2>/dev/null || echo 'Tag already pushed'
scripts.create-github-release: echo 'Creating GitHub release...' && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes --title "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" || echo 'GitHub release creation failed or already exists'
